search.query: `via_verde_index` service = "Portagens" | eval trip = entry_point + " - " + exit_point | stats first(value) as value values(entry_point) values(exit_point) by trip | rename values(*) AS * | fields entry_point exit_point value | outputlookup via_verde_trip_prices.csv

`via_verde_index` service = "Portagens" | stats c by entry_point | eval latitude = "", longitude = "" | fields - c | rename entry_point AS location | append [search `via_verde_index` service = "Portagens" | stats c by exit_point | eval latitude = "", longitude = "" | fields - c | rename exit_point AS location] | dedup location | outputlookup via_verde_tolls_location.csv
